html:
{{doc.name}}
{{doc.posting_date|string + ' ' + (doc.posting_time|string).split('.')[0]}}
{% for i in range(1,6) %} {% endfor %}
{{doc.sender}} {{doc.recipient}}
{{doc.sender_in_line_address}} {{doc.recipient_in_line_address}}
{{doc.sender_phone if doc.sender_phone}} {{doc.recipient_phone if doc.recipient_phone}}
{{i if doc.items|length >= i}} {{doc.items[i - 1].item_name if doc.items|length >= i}} {{doc.items[i - 1].qty|int if doc.items|length >= i}} {{doc.items[i - 1].uom if doc.items|length >= i}} {{doc.items[i - 1].rate|int if doc.items|length >= i}} {{doc.items[i - 1].amount|int if doc.items|length >= i and ("Source" in doc.cash_on)}} {{doc.items[i - 1].amount|int if doc.items|length >= i and ("Target" in doc.cash_on)}}
{{_("County Extended Price") + ': ' + doc.county_extended_price|str if doc.county_extended_price > 0}} {{doc.grand_total|int if doc.grand_total and ("Source" in doc.cash_on)}} {{doc.grand_total|int if doc.grand_total and ("Target" in doc.cash_on)}}
name: บิลต่อเนื่อง

html:
{{ letter_head }}
{% set ns = namespace(do=0, list=0, qty=0) %} {% set items = doc.items %} {% for item in items | sort(attribute='recipient') %} {% set delivery_order = frappe.get_doc('Delivery Order', item.delivery_order) %} {% set ns.do = ns.do + 1 %} {% if item.delivery_order %} {% endif %} {% set sender = item.sender %} {% set shipping_address = frappe.get_doc('TMS Recipient', delivery_order.recipient_id) %}
{% for item in delivery_order.items %} {% set ns.list = ns.list + 1 %} {% set ns.qty = ns.qty + item.qty %} {% endfor %}
{{ item.delivery_order }} {{frappe.format(delivery_order.posting_date, {'fieldtype': 'Date'})}} {{ item.hand_bill_no if item.hand_bill_no }} {{shipping_address.address_title}} {{shipping_address.county}} {{delivery_order.sender}} {% if 'Cash Source' == delivery_order.cash_on %} (1) {% elif 'Credit Source' == delivery_order.cash_on %} (2) {% elif 'Cash Target' == delivery_order.cash_on %} (3) {% elif 'Credit Target' == delivery_order.cash_on %} (4) {% else %} {% endif %}
{{ item.item_name }} {{ item.qty|int }} {{ item.uom }} {{ item.amount|int }}
{% endfor %}
{{_("Delivery Order")}} : {{ns.do|int}}
{{_("List")}} : {{ns.list|int}}
{{_("Qty")}} : {{ns.qty|int}}
{{ _("Remark") if doc.remark else '' }} {{ ":" if doc.remark else '' }} {{doc.remark or ''}}
{% if not no_letterhead and footer %}
{{ footer }}
{% endif %}
name: เที่ยวรถ

html:
{{ letter_head }}
{% set ns = namespace(do=0, list=0, qty=0, collect=0) %} {% set items = doc.items %} {% for item in items %} {% set delivery_order = frappe.get_doc('Delivery Order', item.delivery_order) %} {% set ns.do = ns.do + 1 %} {% set sender = delivery_order.sender %} {% set shipping_address = frappe.get_doc('TMS Recipient', delivery_order.recipient_id) %}
{{ delivery_order.name }} {{ delivery_order.hand_bill_no if delivery_order.hand_bill_no }} {{shipping_address.address_title}} {{shipping_address.in_line_address}} {{shipping_address.county}} {{_(delivery_order.cash_on)}} {% if "Target" in delivery_order.cash_on %} {% set ns.collect = ns.collect + delivery_order.grand_total %} {{delivery_order.grand_total}} {% endif %}
{% endfor %}
{{_("Need Collect")}} : {{ns.collect}}
{{ _("Remark") if doc.remark else '' }} {{ ":" if doc.remark else '' }} {{doc.remark or ''}}
{% if not no_letterhead and footer %}
{{ footer }}
{% endif %}
name: รถเล็ก

[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "

โดย {{ doc.company_name }} {{ doc.company_address }} เลขผู้เสียภาษี: {{ doc.company_tax_id }}

ใบเสร็จ

เลขที่ใบเสร็จ: {{ doc.name.split("-")[3] }}{{ doc.name.split("-")[4] }}{{ doc.name.split("-")[5] }} วันที่: {{ doc.posting_date }}
